alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 29 at 3:01AM MDT until May 29 at 3:15AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MINNEHAHA AND LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 400 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sioux Falls to near Harrisburg to 6 miles south of Worthing, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. At 359 am CDT...Golf ball sized hail was reported in west Sioux Falls. These severe storms will be near... Sioux Falls, Harrisburg and Renner around 405 AM CDT. Lake Alvin State Recreation Area around 410 AM CDT. Brandon, Corson, Rowena and Newton Hills State Park around 415 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Canton, Palisades State Park, Garretson and Valley Springs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
